original_text: If you do what is right, will you not be accepted? But if you do not do what is right, sin is crouching at your door; it desires to have you, but you must rule over it.”
korean_text: 네가 선을 행하면 어찌 낯을 들지 못하겠느냐 선을 행하지 아니하면 죄가 문에 엎드려 있느니라 죄가 너를 원하나 너는 죄를 다스릴지니라

sentences.original_text: If you do what is right
But if you do not do what is right
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 만약 당신이 옳은 일을 하지 않는다면

sentences.original_text: sin is crouching at your door
but you must rule over it
